plot_vel_dist module¶

1st attempt at converting velocities. Deprecated.

plot_vel_dist.energy_to_velocity(vec, species='i')¶

Converts energy components in GSE to velocity.

E = gamma mc**2 Let Er = m/c**2 <- Rest Mass energy => v = c * sqrt(1-1/((E/Er + 1)^2))

plot_vel_dist.polar_to_GSE(E, theta, phi)¶

Converts MMS angles to energy components in GSE XYZ. phi=0 -> GSE +X theta = 0 -> GSE +Z

equations: x = r sin(theta) cos(phi) y = r sin(theta) sin(phi) z = r cos(theta)
